activities: NewsCred collects names, demographical information and social actions (i.e. likes, shares, and Tweets), from third party data providers in order to power the “Audience Insights” database, which allows NewsCred clients to ascertain who is engaging with their content on social media.  NewsCred also collects names, addresses and email addresses through marketing partners via conference sponsorships and other lead generation activities in order to supply leads to the sales team with whom to follow up over email and phone.  NewsCred uses such contact information to (i) communicate with leads about products, services, offers, events and promotions, (ii) send content marketing emails to leads and current clients with articles of interest, and (iii) other purposes listed in the NewsCred Privacy Policy.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line and manually processed data
recoursemech: NewsCred will cooperate with JAMS in accordance with the JAMS International Mediation Rules
